sentences.en: ‘Was it murder?’ ‘ Quite possibly (= it is very likely ) .’
"I can't possibly comment on that," Paul said evasively.
sentences.cn: “我无法对此发表评论，”保罗闪烁其词地说。

sentences.en: "You can't possibly use this word."— 'So I won't.'
sentences.cn: “你绝不会使用这样的字眼。”——“我的确不会。”

sentences.en: Could you possibly knock me up some scrambled eggs?
sentences.cn: 你能尽快给我弄个炒鸡蛋吗？

sentences.en: Do you think that he could possibly be right?
sentences.cn: 你觉得他有可能是对的吗？

sentences.en: He could not possibly have been poisoned as popular legend has it.
sentences.cn: 他不可能像民间传说的那样被下了毒。

sentences.en: He's cut loose from this business except, possibly, where James is concerned.
sentences.cn: 可能除了詹姆斯外，公司里都没人能管得了他。

sentences.en: I am managing, but I could not possibly give up work.
sentences.cn: 我正在努力应付，但我不可能放弃工作。

sentences.en: I mean, how could they possibly eat that stuff?
sentences.cn: 我的意思是，他们怎么可能吃那东西呢？

sentences.en: I'm fully booked up, I couldn't possibly do it now.
sentences.cn: 我现在忙得很，不可能腾出手做这个。

sentences.en: It was the most unexpected piece of news one could possibly imagine.
sentences.cn: 这条新闻最出人意料了，真是让人想象不到。

sentences.en: It will take three weeks, possibly longer.
sentences.cn: 要花三个星期，也许更久。

sentences.en: It's one of the nicest feelings you can possibly have.
sentences.cn: 这是一种极其美妙的感觉。

sentences.en: There's nothing more they can possibly do right.
sentences.cn: 他们除此之外啥也做不了。

sentences.en: They were smartly but casually dressed; possibly students.
sentences.cn: 他们衣着时尚，但很休闲，也许是学生。

sentences.en: This last task is possibly the most difficult.
sentences.cn: 这最后一项任务也许是最难的。

words.tran_cn: 可能性；可能发生的事物
可能性；合适的人；可能的事物

trans.tran_cn: 可能地，也许，或许，敢是，容许
trans.tran_en: used when saying that something may be true or likely, although you are not completely certain
